comment: A more efficient proof of Theorem 9.20 of [Clemente] p. 45. Compare with ~ ex-natded9.20 . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 19-Feb-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
